quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“duty”的“职责”义或“jury”的“评审团”义，将“jury duty”误解为“陪审团的职责”或“评审团的义务”，忽略其“被传唤担任陪审员的法律义务”这一核心。
quiz_item.sentence: When John received a summons from the court, he realized he had to fulfill his **jury duty** even though it would take time away from work.

option.definition: 被传唤担任陪审员的法律义务
